mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE (NOTICE_NO ,NOTICE_HITS ,NOTICE_MEMBER_ID ,NOTICE_TITLE ,NOTICE_CONTENTS ,NOTICE_REGDATE) VALUES ( (SELECT NVL ( MAX ( NOTICE_NO ), 0 ) + 1 FROM NOTICE) ,0 ,#{noticeMemberId} ,#{noticeTitle} ,#{noticeContents} ,SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT NOTICE_NO ,NOTICE_MEMBER_ID ,NOTICE_TITLE ,NOTICE_HITS ,NOTICE_REGDATE FROM (SELECT NOTICE_NO ,NOTICE_MEMBER_ID ,NOTICE_TITLE ,NOTICE_HITS ,NOTICE_REGDATE ,ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY NOTICE_NO DESC) AS NUMROW FROM NOTICE ) WHERE NUMROW BETWEEN (#{page} - 1) * (#{size}) AND ((#{page}) * (#{size}))
